name: All That Remains (itch) (TodesBrot)
description:
THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS

You play as a war veteran who suffers from PTSD. This is one of those times that your memory starts to resurface, and you try to drown it out.

Escape your memories by destroying everything that makes loud noises. Be careful to stay sane though! Pills can help with this.

---

Made by Ayaka and TodesBrot for the GDL January Jam
